= Add a new user to the system =

== Use Case Brief ==
 * B1. This use case specifies the capability required to add a new _User_ to the _System_.
 * B2. The _Client_ ....

== Details ==
 * *Level:* Client Goal
 * *Primary Actor:* _Client_

== Preconditions ==
 * The _Client_ application has been authenticated

== Resources ==
 * _urn:oor:colore:admin:user_

== Main Success Scenarios ==
 * M1. Create Project:
  # The Ontologist launches the New Project Wizard.
  # The System displays the New Project Wizard.
  # The Ontologist enters a name in the Project Name field.
  # The System validates the project name.
  # The Ontologist defines the project location.
  # The Ontologist clicks Finish.
  # The System generates the new project structure under the specified location.
  # The System updates the Samian Navigator to display the new project.

== Extensions ==
 * E1. Unknown System Error {All}:
  # The System terminates the New Project Wizard.
  # The System adds an error message to the System Log.

 * E2. Duplicate Project Name Error {M1d}:
  # The System displays a message in the New Project Wizard indicating that a project with the specified name already exists.
  # The System positions the cursor within the Project Name Field.
  # The Ontologist resumes at M1c.
